Component.Name: MessengerIOServer
Component.Description: Transports property and signal values between applications.

Signal.Name: outputDisabled
Signal.Description: Set to true when output is disabled (if parameter RD output disable control is set, and RDManager is not ActiveMaster).

Signal.Name: Send-Receive Roundtrip time
Signal.Description: [Disabled] Time to send and receive IOServer packets

Signal.Name: NumberOfNodes
Signal.Description: [Disabled] Number of nodes defined in IOServer file.

Parameter.Name: Fresh request interval
Parameter.Description: Time interval for resend of signal request when signal request is fresh.

Parameter.Name: Old request interval
Parameter.Description: Time interval for resend of signal request when signal request is old.

Parameter.Name: Timeout inpackets
Parameter.Description: Timeout from last packet received to input packet destroy.

Parameter.Name: Timeout outpackets
Parameter.Description: Timeout from remote server connection lost to output packet destroy.

Parameter.Name: Max messages
Parameter.Description: Maximum number of request messages sent each process run.

Parameter.Name: Max requests
Parameter.Description: Maximum number of requests packed in one request message.
